mapper.select: SELECT agencycode, agencyname, agencytel1, agencytel2, agencytel3, agencyzipcode1, agencyzipcode2, agencyaddress, LOCATION, agencygubun, deliveryagencycode, comyumu, sending_grade, arrival_grade, gibu_grade, com_grade, sendinglink_grade, arrivallink_grade, relay_grade, chulgounitcost, chulgounitcostrate, link_grade, area, openday, closeday, closegubun, arrivalgubun, balgroup, inputdate, seoulcode, gibangcode, terminalcode FROM code.agencycode
